app.name: End User Labels
app.short_description: Change field labels from agent view to customer view.
app.long_description:
Allow admins to change ticket field labels from agent view to customer view for consistent user experience within agent workspace.

This is particularly useful in instances with complex conditional fields and multiple variations of the same input level.

Built by aidvisor, a dedicated developer and consultant on a mission to extend Zendesk functionality to meet all business needs. Contact us for feature requests and customisation.
